overview:
Brian Rattner enjoyed a career as a highly successful attorney in New York for over two decades and is also an accomplished sales professional, leveraging his excellent interpersonal, communication, writing and presentation skills to support his clients. Brian has managed all aspects of a busy legal office and has outstanding analytical and organizational skills, a high-energy level and an exemplary work ethic.

Brian has a passion for new challenges and seeks to transition from the legal profession to a new field where he can use the many business skills he has developed over the years to increase the profitability and organizational efficiency of a new or existing company.

Brian Rattner is married and is the proud father of four great kids, two of which have severe disabilities. Brian lives in Westchester County, New York and has been involved in the sales and legal profession for more than 20 years.

Brian Rattner loves spending weekends with his children either at home or in upstate New York visiting his oldest son at The Center For Discovery. Having two severely handicapped kids slows down the family, but Brian still finds time to jog, play tennis and go bicycle riding with his kids.
